subject: Accidents and Safety
Shea Stadium (NYC)
lead_paragraph: A 36-year-old man who plunged to his death as he left Tuesday’s game at Shea Stadium had tried to slide down an escalator handrail and lost his balance, the police said.
snippet: A 36-year-old man who plunged to his death as he left Tuesday’s game at Shea Stadium had tried to slide down an escalator handrail and lost his balance, the police said.
